alert.note: Alert for Western Whatcom County (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 21 at 6:38PM PST until December 21 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Seattle
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Freezing rain with accumulations of 0.10 inches are possible in some locations through this evening before precipitation changes over to rain later this evening. * WHERE...Lowlands of western Whatcom County, including Point Roberts, Lummi Island, Bellingham, and Sumas. * WHEN...Until 10 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...A Winter Weather Advisory means that periods of snow, sleet, or freezing rain will cause travel difficulties. Be prepared for slippery roads and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions in Washington state, call 5 1 1.
